name: Future Strike HD
description:
Duke it out with a friend in a platform fighter where knockback is one second delayed.

Future Strike HD is a remake of Future Strike; one of the first games I made. When you attack your opponent, they have one second (1100 ms) until the knockback gets applied, use this to string together combos.  New in the remake is a character customizer where you can choose the outfit your fighter wears in battle.

Controls:
Player 1 Move - Arrow Keys
Player 1 Attack - Down Arrow Key
Player 2 Move - WASD
Player 2 Attack - S
